locations.name: Home
locations.description: Player starts off in the living room standing, fully dressed for the workday

options.GOOD: Bus Driver knows where DRW is and is helpful
options.BAD: Bus Driver does not know where DRW is, is not helpful

locations.name: Downtown
locations.description: A bustling Chicago skyline with the Willis Tower, as you rush through busy streets on your first day, hoping to arrive on time

locations.name: Speak with Person
locations.description: Talk with person or ignore

options.GOOD: The Person is helpful, you can head straight to DRW building
options.BAD: The Person is not helpful, you are lost for X minutes, delaying your time to get to work

locations.name: Cozy Coffee Shop
locations.description: At a cozy coffee shop, a latte sets a positive tone for your first day

locations.name: Coffee Event, a boost
locations.description: Coffee sipping, setting a positive tone for the day

options.GOOD: You get a caffeine high, you get to work earlier

locations.name: Coffee Event, no boost
locations.description: Coffee sipping, ok start

options.BAD: The coffee was nasty, you are delayed on your way to work

locations.name: Car
locations.description: Inside car

locations.name: Construction Event
locations.description: Construction on the highway delays your commute by 20 minutes on your first day.

locations.name: Traffic Event
locations.description: Highway gridlock adds a 15-minute delay to your first day at work

locations.name: Accident Event
locations.description: Accident ahead. Expect a 10-minute delay, likely to make you late

locations.name: Parking Option
locations.description: Park close pay, Park far walk

locations.name: Parking Close
locations.description: Parked nearby, but pricey. Walk to first day, hoping it's worth it

locations.name: Parking Far
locations.description: Affordable parking far away. Rushing to the office, first-day urgency

locations.name: On time
locations.description: Arriving on time at DRW building, relief washes over you. Ready for a promising first day

locations.name: Late
locations.description: Late at DRW building, dread replaces relief on your first day
